data.name: Sunrise's Order
data.detailed_description:
You are a little too addicted to the brand new farm game that has just been released. So addicted, that you forget to go to work for several days and are fired. You take advantage of this situation to decide to go on an adventure like the hero of your favorite video game. After buying a desert island to build your farm there, you are finally ready to live a new life and face all the pitfalls that will arise to succeed in living off your crops.

ANIMAZON
As you are the only inhabitant on this desert island, you will have to use a delivery service to better equip yourself. Lucky for you, there is Animazon. THE award-winning and most reliable delivery service. Through Animazon, you can buy everything you'll need to succeed in your quest to become a successful small farmer. Need seeds, animals such as a cow or even a cooking recipe? No need to give you the answer, you already know it: ANIMAZON.

TREE SKILL
Need more time for your days, for your plants to grow faster or for your purchases to cost less? You'll have to work hard to earn valuable skill points and be able to spend them in the skill tree to reap great bonuses.

METEOROLOGY
The weather is unpredictable and can in some cases be a good element playing in your favor or on the contrary be binding. If I can give you some advice; be careful not to get sick.

THE FIELD
You can expand your space on the island by clearing new fields and define it among the following choices: field, garden, animal husbandry, industrial and many more.

OTHER FUNCTIONS
Fishing
Using your fishing rod, play a mini-game to catch beautiful fish.

The kitchen
Prepare delicious meals using your small kitchen and enjoy them to earn energy points.

Internet access
Improve your internet connection to have access to Animazon anywhere at any time on the island.

Free Shipping
With a small subscription, you could get rid of the cost of delivery when ordering on Animazon.

data.short_description: Having your own farm as your favorite game hero is your biggest dream. You decide to become the proud owner of a desert island and you are ready to embark on this new adventure and sell your farm products to your future customers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Pentium(R) CPU G4600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX550/550 Series
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
